value.fullName: Yes, I would like a roommate who prefers a quiet environment with fewer people hanging around.
value.label: Yes, I would like a roommate who prefers a quiet environment with fewer people hanging around.

value.fullName: No, I like to have people over, share my space, and play music without headphones/earbuds.
value.label: No, I like to have people over, share my space, and play music without headphones/earbuds.
